attributes.additional_details: Pakistan can afford nuclear weapons and a space programme so why is the UK sending them £441Million Foreign Aid money we send to some of these Country's who economy in some places are in a better state then our own, and in a good many of these Country's the Aid does not get to where it is most needed
attributes.background: UK needs to get our own house in order,

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could also sign the petition below, which asks the Government to stop sending foreign aid to countries that have space programs, which would include Pakistan:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/184574
